fields.summary: iOS: Memory is not being released when a tab is removed from tabGroup
fields.environment:
Product: Titanium Mobile
Titanium SDK: 1.8.1, 1.9.0 CI
Host OS: Mac OS X Lion
Platform OS: iOS
Platform OS Version: 5.0

comments.body: Please do not reopen resolved bugs if you need them in another branch.

Issue persists. Reproduction steps:

1. Launch code above
2. Click "Tab 2"
3. Click "Tab 1"
4. Click "Remove tab1"

*PASS*: 1 of: TiUIWindowProxy, TiUITabProxy, TiUILabelProxy

Closing as Fixed.

SDK: 2.0.0.v20120319003254
Studio: 2.0.0.201203182248
OS: Snow Leopard
Devices Tested: iPhone4S 5.0.1

Attached Success Screenshot: Instruments Correct Screenshot.png

The memory is not being released for the objects: TiUIWindowProxy, TiUITabProxy, TiUILabelProxy

Tested on SDK:2.1.0.v20120625134154
Tested on Studio:2.1.0.201206251749
Devices:iPad3(5.1), iphone 3GS(5.0.1)
OS: OSX 10.7.3

This was working fine on 2.0.2
Fixed by PR 2479 on master and PR 2480 on 2_1_X

Closing issue:

Tested with Ti Studio build 2.1.0.201206251749
Ti Mobile SDK 2.1.0.v20120627121617 hash r06667517
OSX Lion 10.7.3
iPhone 4S OS 5.0.1

Expected behavior is shown. Note it can take a few minutes on device for the living memory to drop to 1.
